message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $11000, a price that I think is very competitive given its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I understand you're looking to make a deal, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $9800. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable going below $10000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10400. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your concession, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9800. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.
